v1.6.2.1 Hotfix & v1.6.2 Highlights

üõ† Hotfixes
- Smart Menu: Management menus now open upward near the screen edge to prevent clipping.
- UI Alignment: Fixed '...' button alignment in the Device Management list.

‚ú® New Features (v1.6.2)
- Update Notifier: Internal alerts for new module versions.
- Data Management: Export and restore all smartphone data via JSON files.
- Broken Screen: GMs can now 'crack' player screens for immersive roleplay.

üêõ Bug Fixes (v1.6.2)
- Time Sync: Fixed message timestamps not updating in real-time.
- Activation Logic: Carrier messages now send only for the world's very first device.
